trans-unit.source: Describes desired expansion behavior of an inertia processor.
trans-unit.target: 描述惯性处理器的所需的扩展行为。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the desired expansion deceleration, in coordinate units per millisecond squared.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置所需的扩展减速，以坐标单位 / 平方毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: This property value is mutually exclusive with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A> properties; setting this property will set <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A> to `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性值是与互斥<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A>属性; 设置此属性将设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A>到`NaN`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是`NaN`。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set while the inertia processor is running; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 惯性处理器正在运行; 时，不能设置此属性否则，会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The desired expansion deceleration, in coordinate units per millisecond squared.
trans-unit.target: 所需的扩展的减速，以坐标单位 / 平方毫秒为单位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the desired expansion along the x-axis, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置沿 x 轴，所需的扩展以坐标单位。

trans-unit.source: Expansion must be proportional.
trans-unit.target: 扩展必须是成比例。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A> property when the inertia processor starts; otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值必须等于的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A>属性时立即开始惯性处理器; 否则会引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionY%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property value is mutually exclusive with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property; setting this property will set <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> to `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性值是与互斥<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>属性; 设置此属性将设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>到`NaN`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是`NaN`。

trans-unit.source: DesiredExpansionX must be a finite, non-negative number.
trans-unit.target: DesiredExpansionX 必须是一个有限的非负数字。

trans-unit.source: The rate of expansion is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 扩展的速率由<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set while the inertia processor is running; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 惯性处理器正在运行; 时，不能设置此属性否则，会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The desired expansion along the x-axis, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: 沿 x 轴，以坐标单位所需的扩展。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the desired expansion along the y-axis, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置沿 y 轴，所需的扩展以坐标单位。

trans-unit.source: Expansion must be proportional.
trans-unit.target: 扩展必须是成比例。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A> property when the inertia processor starts; otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值必须等于的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A>属性时立即开始惯性处理器; 否则会引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredExpansionX%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property value is mutually exclusive with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property; setting this property will set <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> to `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性值是与互斥<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>属性; 设置此属性将设置<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>到`NaN`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是`NaN`。

trans-unit.source: DesiredExpansionY must be a finite, non-negative number.
trans-unit.target: DesiredExpansionY 必须是一个有限的非负数字。

trans-unit.source: The rate of expansion is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 扩展的速率由<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set while the inertia processor is running; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 惯性处理器正在运行; 时，不能设置此属性否则，会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The desired expansion along the y-axis, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: 沿 y 轴，以坐标单位的所需的延伸。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial average radius, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的初始的平均半径，以坐标单位。

trans-unit.source: This property is used by the inertia processor to calculate the scale factor for an element that is expanding.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是惯性处理器用于计算正在展开一个元素的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: For instance, if the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> properties are set to 3.75, this informs the inertia processor that the starting expansion velocity is 3.75 coordinate units per millisecond along both axes (expansion must be proportional).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>属性设置为 3.75，这将通知惯性处理器的起始延伸速度是 3.75 坐标单位 / 沿 （扩展必须是成比例） 两个轴的毫秒。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>

trans-unit.source: The scale factor associated with this rate of expansion depends upon the size of the element that is expanding.
trans-unit.target: 与此速率的扩展关联的缩放比例取决于正在扩展元素的大小。

trans-unit.source: For a small element, this expansion velocity represents a larger scale factor than for a large element.
trans-unit.target: 对于小的元素，此扩展速度表示较大比例因子比大型元素。

trans-unit.source: You inform the inertia processor of the element size by setting the InitialRadius property.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置 InitialRadius 属性通知惯性处理器的元素大小。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the InitialRadius property is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: InitialRadius 属性的默认值为 1.0。

trans-unit.source: Valid values are any finite number greater than or equal to 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 有效值为任意有限数量大于或等于 1.0。

trans-unit.source: The initial average radius, in coordinate units.
trans-unit.target: 初始平均半径，以坐标单位。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial expansion velocity along the x-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置沿 x 轴，初始延伸速度，以毫秒为单位为坐标单位。

trans-unit.source: Expansion must be proportional.
trans-unit.target: 扩展必须是成比例。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> property when the inertia processor starts; otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值必须等于的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>属性时立即开始惯性处理器; 否则会引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是`NaN`。

trans-unit.source: Leaving this property and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> unchanged from the default or setting this property and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> to zero (0) will disable expansion inertia.
trans-unit.target: 此属性保留和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>从默认值或设置此属性不变并<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>为零 (0)，则将禁用扩展惯性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityY%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set while the inertia processor is running; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 惯性处理器正在运行; 时，不能设置此属性否则，会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The initial expansion velocity along the x-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 沿 x 轴，以毫秒为单位为坐标单位初始延伸速度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the initial expansion velocity along the y-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置沿 y 轴的初始延伸速度，以毫秒为单位为坐标单位。

trans-unit.source: Expansion must be proportional.
trans-unit.target: 扩展必须是成比例。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property must equal the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> property when the inertia processor starts; otherwise an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值必须等于的值<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>属性时立即开始惯性处理器; 否则会引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for this property is `NaN`.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的默认值是`NaN`。

trans-unit.source: Leaving this property and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> unchanged from the default or setting this property and <xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> to zero (0) will disable expansion inertia.
trans-unit.target: 此属性保留和<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>从默认值或设置此属性不变并<xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>为零 (0)，则将禁用扩展惯性。</xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.Manipulations.InertiaExpansionBehavior2D.InitialVelocityX%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set while the inertia processor is running; otherwise, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 惯性处理器正在运行; 时，不能设置此属性否则，会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The initial expansion velocity along the y-axis, in coordinate units per millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 沿 y 轴，以毫秒为单位为坐标单位的初始延伸速度。
